reviewText:
An authoritative mother, architect tries with all her will and untamed spirit to protect his son in disgrace, once he has had a fatal collison in which a 14 years old child has dead.

The shame, the sorrow and the redemption flow before her eyes in this intense and haunting drama.

An intelligent script, a marvelous cast, a fabulous crew make this apparaently simple story becomes a true study of the human condition around this unthinkable situation.

A film that deserved the GOLDEN BEAR IN BERLIN 2013. Neither more nor less. So, how can you be wrong with this engaging personal drama?

Absolutely recommended.
